duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide first-line support to users, ensuring a positive experience with the Foureyes platform.
Master the Foureyes platform and provide technical support for other key infrastructure technologies such as Salesforce and Intercom.
Analyze user challenges and make recommendations to enhance their experience.
Manage the setup of Foureyes accounts, ensuring correctness and optimization for user needs.
Monitor and report on performance metrics, including ticket response times, loads, and customer satisfaction.
Act as a key resource for customer and internal stakeholder technical support needs.
Maintain and manage reports and systems to ensure smooth operation of products for clients.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent work experience. 2+ years of experience in product/customer support preferred. Experience working for a SaaS company or within a technical team preferred. Experience working with large data sets preferred.
